channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report E-2024060078
item.description:
Report E-2024060078

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-14T15:12:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-07
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: XPO Logistics terminal UDV experienced a UN2734 Tri-Act 1825 release from a 330-gallon metal tote. ERTS dispatched contractors to conduct cleanup operations. Contractors arrived onsite and confirmed approximately 0.5-gallons of product released to a 2’ x 1’ area of the wood trailer floor and tote body due to the cap coming off in transit. The cap was re-secured to the tote. The impacted tote and trailer floor were cleaned with pads and simple green. The impacted rags and PPE were placed into a 55-gallon poly drum. The waste was staged onsite for terminal personnel to manage.
